ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: OT - Video cards, was:Equipment question
ygData.msgSnippet: If you haven t purchased Velious - you will flip to low-rez every time you go to inventory (and will always do so for spell book).  Optionally
ygData.messageBody:
If you haven't purchased Velious - you will flip to "low-rez" every time you
go to inventory (and will always do so for spell book). Optionally
(stay-in-same-resolution of some such) -you will get the small border thing
you see when you first change modes.

With Velious they have a much improved Inventory Interface where you get an
overlay screen - it's very nice.

Slyde

-----Original Message-----
From: Stacey [mailto:selene1212@...]
Sent: Wednesday, June 13, 2001 10:48 AM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [eqbards] Re: OT - Video cards, was:Equipment question


--- In eqbards@y..., Henrik Holm <HEH@z...> wrote:
> Try hitting <F10> ingame. The little area is only when youre using
the
> "boxed" mode..
>
> Musiker
>

Ok, I'll try this. One more question though. How do I access my
inventory when in full screen mode? I normally do play in full
screen, but when ever I hit "I" it goes back to windowed mode... I
need to figure this out first or it will suck to play in another
video mode. What about the spellbook screen? Isn't this a hassle too
if the windowed veiw is really tiny?? Please help =)

Kinrea Keres
45th DE warrior

Lereny
13th Half Elf Bard
